segments.text: Observing this scene, the kitchen feels lived-in and familiar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman polishes her plate with steady hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her own world, ignoring the running faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows the basin, streaming onto the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens, touching her foot without a flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, the boy perches on an unsteady stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He delves into the cookie jar with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him reaches up, eyes full of hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, but it's innocently mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the combination of wet tiles and tipping stool scares me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a peaceful garden path and plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disappointing that such a normal day could turn disastrous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The soaked cabinets look pitiful, absorbing all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
